name: move_forward
description: A controlled forward movement to close distance, maintaining balance and readiness for offensive or defensive actions

name: move_backwards
description: A smooth backward movement to create distance, evading attacks while staying poised to counter or reposition.

name: jab
description: A quick, straight punch thrown with the lead hand, designed for speed, precision, and setting up combinations while maintaining defensive readiness

name: jab_body
description: A swift, crouching jab that lowers the head to abdomen level, combining offense with natural defense against upper attacks.

name: cross
description: A powerful, straight punch thrown with the rear hand, utilizing full body rotation for maximum speed and impact, aimed to penetrate through an opponent's guard.

name: cross_body
description: A strong, straight rear-hand punch delivered at a downward angle, targeting the opponent's midsection while maintaining defensive balance and utilizing full body rotation for power.

name: hook_left
description: A sharp, arcing punch thrown with the lead hand, targeting the side of the opponent's head or jaw, using hip rotation for power while maintaining defensive guard.

name: hook_left_body
description: A tight, lead-hand hook aimed at the opponent's midsection, driving power from hip rotation to break their stance and weaken their core.

name: hook_right
description: A sharp, arcing punch thrown with the right hand, targeting the side of the opponent's head or jaw, using hip rotation for power while maintaining defensive guard.

name: hook_right_body
description: A tight, right-hand hook aimed at the opponent's midsection, driving power from hip rotation to break their stance and weaken their core.

name: upper_left
description: A rising left-hand punch delivered in a close range, targeting the opponent's chin or jaw with an upward motion, powered by the legs and torso for impact

name: upper_left_body
description: A left-hand uppercut aimed at the opponent's midsection, driving upward to target the ribs or solar plexus, combining precision with upward force.

name: upper_right
description: A rising right-hand punch delivered in a close range, targeting the opponent's chin or jaw with an upward motion, powered by the legs and torso for impact

name: upper_right_body
description: A right-hand uppercut aimed at the opponent's midsection, driving upward to target the ribs or solar plexus, combining precision with upward force.

name: dodge_backwards_cross
description: A right-hand uppercut aimed at the opponent's midsection, driving upward to target the ribs or solar plexus, combining precision with upward force.

name: parry_left_body
description: Parry body enemy right low attacks. Successful parries deal damage and interrupt.
